doc.summary: Gets the <ref cls="net/minecraft/core/HolderSet">HolderSet</ref> associated with a tag.
doc.text: Gets the <ref cls="net/minecraft/core/HolderSet">HolderSet</ref> associated with a tag.  If the tag does not yet exist, it is created.

doc.summary: Gets the <ref cls="net/minecraft/core/HolderSet">HolderSet</ref> associated with a tag.
doc.text: Gets the <ref cls="net/minecraft/core/HolderSet">HolderSet</ref> associated with a tag.  If the tag does not yet exist, the returned <ref cls="java/util/Optional">Optional</ref> will be empty.

doc.summary: A class to help accessing <ref cls="net/minecraft/tags/TagKey">tags</ref> in a more user friendly way.
doc.text: A class to help accessing <ref cls="net/minecraft/tags/TagKey">tags</ref> in a more user friendly way.  A <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/util/data/TagAccess">TagAccess</ref> can contain a <ref cls="net/minecraft/core/RegistryAccess">RegistryAccess</ref> to allow accessing  dynamic registries.

properties.text: Use <ref cls="net/minecraft/core/HolderSet">HolderSet</ref>s where possible in datapack registries and <ref cls="net/minecraftforge/registries/tags/ITagManager">ITagManager</ref> for              forge non-datapack registries.
